name: Cloud Runner(week 110 Game Jam Submission)
description:
This game was created for Week 110 of the Weekly Game Jams. In Cloud Runner you are a running around on randomly generated islands trying to survive as the blocks you walk on start to fall. You are always moving and after upgrading the island twice you gain the chance to see a ship which you can board to unlock more features.

The video documenting it's development will come out soon, hopefully on August 24th.
